message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to start the negotiations at $11,000. What do you think?
That's a good starting point, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $10,500 for it right now.  Let's see if we can meet in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. What do you think?

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still only comfortable paying $11,000.  I'm hoping we can find a way to make this work.  Let's try to reach an agreement, otherwise I may need to consider other options.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving too much on the table. I'm thinking of $11,750. Can we meet in the middle on this one?
Alice,  I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still only willing to pay $11,250.  If we can't agree on this price, I'll need to consider other options.  This is my final offer.

I understand you're getting close to your limit, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $12,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm thinking of $11,800. Can we meet on this one?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable going above $11,250. If you're willing to accept this price, we can close the deal. If not, I'll have to consider my other options.

I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $12,000. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm thinking of $11,900. Can we meet on this one?
